channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 12:15 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh in the direction of Novopavlivka
item.description: 🟠 12:15 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh in the direction of Novopavlivka #m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
